text: Chuan Leekpai (, , ; ; born 28 July 1938) is a Thai politician. He is the President of the National Assembly of Thailand and the Speaker of the Thai House of Representatives. He was the Thai prime minister from 20 September 1992 to 19 May 1995 and again from 9 November 1997 to 9 February 2001. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:Prime ministers of Thailand Category:Presidents of the National Assembly of Thailand Category:Speakers of the House of Representatives (Thailand)
title: Chuan Leekpai
